extension.name: CDN Tax Receipts
extension.description: Provides PDF tax receipts for Canadian charities, including single or annual tax receipts, with distribution by email or print.
extension.comments: Developed as a collaboration between Karin Gerritsen (semper-it.com), Alan Dixon (blackflysolutions.ca), Lola Slade (freeform.ca), and Jake Martin White (peaceworks.ca)
